bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of the two evils feng 風 , wind, and shi 濕 , moisture, together causing a disease. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 1: 人腠理虛者，則由風濕氣傷之 , “When the interstitial structures of man are depleted, they will be the starting points of his being harmed by wind and moisture qi ”.

② Pathological Condition brought forth jointly by the two evils wind and moisture. Pu ji fang 普濟方 92: 搜風 順氣丸，治風濕氣，口眼喎斜，大便結澀 , “The ‘pills to wipe off wind and smoothen the path of qi’ cure wind and moisture qi , slanted mouth and eyes, as well as a rough passage of bound stools”.
